title LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{keyword}),'%')
username LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{keyword}),'%')
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT sub.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM () sub) WHERE rnum BETWEEN (((#{page}-1) * #{perPage})+1) AND (#{page} * #{perPage}) AND status=0 ORDER BY postdate desc
mapper.insert: INSERT into kcuserpost(userpostid, username, postdate,title, contents, status) VALUES(#{userPostId},#{username},sysdate,#{title},#{contents},0)
